Resistance.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b2b28c2a-dad9-443a-bd79-4148b840a8b4/COVID Resistance.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"COVID Resistance.png\",\"name\":\"COVID Resistance.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"b2b28c2a-dad9-443a-bd79-4148b840a8b4\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":494,\"height\":96},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"COVID-19 is a difficult virus to track as many individuals who are contagious do not show symptoms and many regions are faced with a lack of conclusive testing or unclear guidance, making it more likely for transmission to spread. As an open source solution that can be customized to specific countries or regions, COVID Resistance is a digital health identity contact tracing mobile app that anonymously tracks risk exposure to COVID-19. The app, which is GDPR and HIPAA-compliant, uses real-time, anonymous, tokenized data through Bluetooth to alert users if they are at risk of COVID-19 transmission based on their proximity with at-risk or infected users.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"iframe\",\"data\":{\"src\":\"//videoportal.epam.com/video/iframe.html?video=1oxMpVRr\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#FF4E33\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Users simply download the app, register with an anonymous profile, and enable Bluetooth functionality. If the app picks up a signal from another user, their tokens are exchanged and registered, creating a record of interaction between the app users. Users can go about their daily lives and are alerted if they are exposed to the virus based on their proximity with at-risk or infected users. If a user starts experiencing symptoms and their status is confirmed as “suspected” or “infected”, the app will notify any other user who was in contact with them.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://solutionshub.epam.com/solution/covid-resistance\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Learn more about COVID Mobile Cloud is a platform for continuous quality assurance that accelerates the delivery and testing of mobile applications, offering manual and automated testing on real
